title: Got 14 day ban a couple weeks ago, was told I was emailed the game logs, but I don't think I got it.
body: Would it be possible to get those? Also, do you guys keep a record of post game chat?

replies.body: If an account is suspended by the Instant Feedback System, it will receive logs via registered email as well as in-game reform card.  Alternatively, you can reach out to the player behavior team to provide some more visibility in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We can also help out with updating your email there.  Hope that helps!
y u no respond to other threads :(
A poro can only move so fast!  I'm throwing snowballs, and dashing to every thread as possible.  :D  Is there a specific thread or issue you're referring to?

:P thanks

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/OLIlpsel-black-screen-on-mac-loading-screen

I just can't play and that makes me sad :(
I will snowball over and see what's up! :P
